title: High-performance brain-to-text communication
notes: Fascinating work on brain-computer interfaces. The signal processing approach here is elegant.

title: Obsidian
notes: My go-to for building a personal knowledge base. Local-first, Markdown-based.

title: How Brain Implants Work
notes: Great explainer on how neural implants actually work.

title: The Pudding
notes: Visual essays that make complex data stories accessible. Always inspiring.

title: Breath: The New Science of a Lost Art
notes: James Nestor's deep dive into the science of breathing. Changed how I think about something so basic.
